root.specsKey: Nikon Coolpix S4150 Point & Shoot Camera (Silver)
4.6 - 23.0 mm (35 mm format equivalent to 26 - 130 mm)
Warranty of the product is limited to only manufacturing defect on camera body & lens.
2 years Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.
Customer needs to carry the product to the nearby Authorized Service Center to get the product repaired or inspected.

Nikon Service Warranty (Local Warranty) does not apply to any of the followings:- Defects or malfunctions caused by damage resulting from improper care, misuse or abuse of this product or operation of this product contrary to the instructions contained in the owner's manual. Damage or defect caused by accident, sand, water or battery leakage. Damage caused during transportation or mail. Damaged caused by any modifications or servicing performed by person(s) other than NIKON AUTHORISED SERVICE FACILITY. Accessories including batteries, charger, AC adaptor and other consumables. Any electronic data loss due to malfunctioning or repair of this product. Any consequential or incidental damages resulting from any breach of warranty, express or implied, applicable to this product. Nikon India New Extended Service Warranty (Local Warranty) does not apply to any of the followings:- Accessories like batteries, charger, USB cable, AV cable, Adapters, strap, etc. are not covered under warranty. Damage caused due to accident, sand, water, dust, fungus, battery leakage, etc are not covered under warranty. Warranty on free gifts is as per the terms of their respective manufactures, and this warranty does not extend to such gifts. Warranty does not cover the replacement of Product. Warranty does not cover any special, consequential or incidental damages arising in way due to malfunction of the Product such as loss of photography, loss of data, use, profits, or costs and expenses, etc.

Pros:1) Takes sharp and bright pics in broad daylight.2) Indoor photographs are average but not bad for a budget camera.3) Huge 14 megapixel resolution.4) Auto ISO works very well in adjusting the exposure level depending on environment lighting conditions. Manual ISO selection is rarely necessary.5) Indoor photographs at close range come alive with flash.6) Settings are easy to understand and change. The touchscreen LCD is convenient in this regard.Cons:1) Low light photography is very poor. Indoor photographs appear grainy when seen on a computer screen.2) Only 8min of video recording is possible at 720p irrespective of the size of your memory card. An absurd limitation considering many other Coolpix models can record atleast 30 mins.3) Low light and indoor video quality is extremely poor and grainy making it only usable only outdoors.4) Unless I am missing something, flash does not work in video mode.5) Electronic VR which is supposed to stabilize image is flaky as best and not as effective as I had expected.Bottomline: If you are normally used to taking shots with your high end mobile camera and looking for a step up but don't intend to break the bank, this is a very good investment as it takes excellent snaps for most practical purposes. If low light photography or extended video recording is your thing, then this camera is not the answer.

i bought this cam on nov,2011. pros: Awesome features. if u compare it with sony w530 which is giving the same features, nikon has hd movie recording(only 8 mins), good night exposure and touch interface. so go for it instead of sony.cons: though optical zoom is 5x, image blurs and shakes mostly if u zoom a lot. hd movie recording is only 8 mins.

No words to say about this camera.Its just incredible.I love my NIKON.Awesome features,Touch display,picture quality,video quality.Everything is too good in this much of price.And I don't think that the price is high.Too good camera.

I bought the camera through flip cart in the last month. All the features are very good and its very user friendly. the only drawback is the video records. A 4GB memory card can store maximum of 10min video in AVI format.Video clarity also less.Worth for money.

I had purchased this camera 6 months back...and have been using the same frequently all the features are fine..the only hitch i had before purchasing a touch-screen cam which i think most of us would have- was whether it will be comfortable in handling i.e taking snaps, zoom in and out..but no need to worry it hardly makes any difference...and service of Flipkart...I ordered it on saturday afternoon and I got it on Monday...keep it up flipkart..looking forward for more shopping this awesome online store...

i have bought this cam from flipkart,i got it delivered within 2 days .....thanx flipkart :)talking about the cam,its just awesome,image clearity is too good.video resolution too is gud.the camera has 20 different image modes,morever it has a touch input
